--- title: "Sheffield Varsity 10K" date: "2012-03-25" author: "Adrian Joseph" categories: [race report, run] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- The Varsity was the competition between the two universities of Sheffield: Sheffield University (the one I attended), and Sheffield Hallam. The strong guys had their own "private" events, but there were a few more open to everyone. I remember it was pretty cold, and there freezing rain earlier in the morning. I went to this event with my friend Denis, but we each did our own race. Which was good, because Denis got the number of laps wrong. It was a 4 laps race, but he thought it was only 3 laps, so he went out way too fast. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
